title: Smart Data Models - WindGenTurbineType1IEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Wind turbine IEC Type 1.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1, section 6.5.2.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindGenTurbineType1IEC

WindAeroConstIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind aerodynamic model associated with this wind turbine type 1 model. Default: None
